com.autonomy.aci.client.services

Interface StAXProcessor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object this processor will generate
    All Superinterfaces:
    Processor<T>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStAXProcessor, ErrorProcessor

    public interface StAXProcessor<T>
extends Processor<T>
    Defines methods that StAX based ACI response processors should implement.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T process(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader aciResponse)
      Process the ACI response input into an object of type T.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.autonomy.aci.client.services.Processor

        process

    • Method Detail

      • process

        T process(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader aciResponse)
          throws AciErrorException,
                 ProcessorException
        Process the ACI response input into an object of type T.
        Parameters:
        aciResponse - The ACI server response to process
        Returns:
        An object of type T
        Throws:
        AciErrorException - If the ACI response was an error response
        ProcessorException - If an error occurred during the processing of the ACI server response
